name: Sorry! oh! sorry!
description:
Johnny Kilmister is a huge fan of Motor Raid.

He never went to any concert because he's not comfortable in a crowd, especially when running out of space. 

Motor Raid just announced their very last show, it will take place during the HellFest, Johnny decided to go. 

Help Johnny to level up his metal concert skills! 

How to Play

Turn up the sound and play the game online!

Commands: 

  • arrow keys to move to the action area
  • space key to jostle and pass through the crowd 

Please note, you can spam the key but caution, the use of the space key is limited and you may run out of space :wink: 

Credits

We built this game as a small crew, everything is hand-crafted with :heart: from code to assets:

  • pierallard - Code, game design, graphics, SFX, Music, Voices 
  • docteurklein - Code, game design, SFX, Voices
  • nidup - Code, game design, graphics, SFX, Voices

Special thanks to Titou, Nono and Yo for the voices!

Tools
  • code in Typescript + PhaserJS
  • soundtracks with Beepbox
  • pixel art with Aseprite & Piskel
